org.dejava.component.security.crypt.hasher

Class CredentialsHasher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.security.crypt.hasher.CredentialsHasher

  • public final class CredentialsHasher
extends Object
    Handles the hash calculation for user credentials.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String[] ALGS_NAMES
      Names of the algorithms used by default.
      static Integer MAX_MAX_CYCLES
      The maximum for the maximum number of hash cycles.
      static Integer MIN_MIN_CYCLES
      The minimum for the minimum number of hash cycles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CredentialsHasher

        public CredentialsHasher()
        Public constructor.

      • CredentialsHasher

        public CredentialsHasher(String[] algorithmsNames,
                 Integer minCycles,
                 Integer maxCycles)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        algorithmsNames - Names of the algorithms to be used in the hash calculation. The first algorithm is also used in other calculations.
        minCycles - The minimum number of hash cycles to be used in the hash calculation.
        maxCycles - The maximum number of hash cycles to be used in the hash calculation.

      • CredentialsHasher

        public CredentialsHasher(HashedCredentials hashedCredentials)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        hashedCredentials - A credential containing information on how to be hashed.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlgorithms

        public MessageDigest[] getAlgorithms()
        Gets the algorithms to be used in the hash calculation.
        Returns:
        The algorithms to be used in the hash calculation.

      • setAlgorithms

        public void setAlgorithms(String[] algorithmsNames)
        Sets the algorithms (with the given names) to be used in the hash calculation.
        Parameters:
        algorithmsNames - Names of the algorithms to be used in the hash calculation. The first algorithm is also used in other calculations.

      • getMinCycles

      • setCredentialHasher

        public void setCredentialHasher(String[] algorithmsNames,
                       Integer minCycles,
                       Integer maxCycles)
        Sets the credential hasher with basic information on hash calculation.
        Parameters:
        algorithmsNames - Names of the algorithms to be used in the hash calculation. The first algorithm is also used in other calculations.
        minCycles - The minimum number of hash cycles to be used in the hash calculation.
        maxCycles - The maximum number of hash cycles to be used in the hash calculation.

        Parameters:

      • hash

        public byte[] hash(byte[] credential,
          String salt)
        Gets the hash from a given credential.
        Parameters:
        credential - The credential to be hashed.
        salt - Salt to be used in the hash calculation. It is a good idea to have an unique salt per user.
        Returns:
        The hash from a given credential.

      • hash

        public byte[] hash(String credentials,
          String salt)
        Gets the hash from a given credentials.
        Parameters:
        credentials - The credential to be hashed.
        salt - Salt to be used in the hash calculation. It is a good idea to have an unique salt per user.
        Returns:
        The hash from a given credential.
